scripts.build: npx tsc -p configs/tsconfig.json & node ./scripts/webpack.js configs/webpack.json & npx api-extractor run --config=configs/api-extractor.json --local & powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ".bin"
scripts.init: npm i & npx tsc & powershell Start-Process -FilePath "regolith" -ArgumentList "run" -PassThru -NoNewWindow -WorkingDirectory ./configs & npm run build
